title: Ap sona, totally fair.
body:
I noticed nobody seems to cry or complain about ap sona "support" even though it's the only way I play her I guess I have to do it.

The scaling, the utlity, the fucking 1 easy ass skill shot! 

The fuck is a varus supposed to do if I decide to just Q auto his ass for 95% of his life.
The fuck does VAYNE do if I just bop her on the nose with a right click.
And you know jinx doesn't got shit to stay alive with.

Late game 600ap sona is just going to run around like a fucking rainbow blowing up whoever the fuck she wants, and nobody can catch her. Hell the enemies had a strong vi and yasuo and all I had to do was W and pop my {{item:3003}} then continue mashing E and healing while they try to catch a zigzagging mute.

I mean, they even had a blitz, a champion who just dumptrucks sona. What the hell is even a counter to her? She has almost no mana costs once you get a tear stacked, your healing is 1/3 of your life, and you dont have to stop to cast anything! 

Remember old heimer Q, he didn't even aim that bitch and could hit like 3 people at once, that got changed, but sona? Nah I'm just gonna ult the frontline, press E then Q auto the assasin/adc whichever I feel deserves to die more, then walk out with E again all before my ult wore off. 


tl;dr just pick a support and build ap, specifically sona...it's great.
